comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

Firefox cannot be opened without its window during startup of Mac OS X.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Check 'Open at Login' of Firefox
2. 'System Preferences' -> 'Accounts' -> 'Login Items' Check 'Hide' option of Firefox
3. Restart the operating system (or just logout) and Login

Actual Results:  
You will see Firefox window

Expected Results:  
Firefox window should be hidden.
